Ashanisha waru na ingine na nusu futi. Sikisha mea, weka c.a.n arufu uparirie na kusifunika. Ukurima bora. Goodday.

S132.Kwansa tayarisha shamba kwa kushibua shini majembe tatu tatu.

Sikisha mea, weka c.a.n arufu uparirie na kusifunika.
Ukurima bora.
Goodday.
